lines.text: I don't mind tooth aches much, but they hurt.
What happened to your tooth, melon head?
Nobody goes into the Forsythe house, it's so full of ghosts they're square dancing in there.
Those hoodlums! If only they didn't owe me so much money.
If you think you can get away with this, you're insane.
A lot of brilliant scientists are considered insane.
